tagline: Your ideal choice for comfortable stays and professional event hosting in the heart of Oromia.
dormitoryBookingPendingApproval: Your dormitory booking request has been received and is pending payment verification. Please follow payment instructions.
facilityBookingPendingApproval: Your facility booking request has been received and is pending approval. We will contact you shortly.
errorSubmittingBooking: There was an error submitting your booking. Please try again.
fillFormToBookDormitory: Fill the form below to book your preferred dormitory.
fillFormToBookFacility: Fill the form below to book the selected facility.
enterEmployer: Enter your employer or organization name
anySpecialRequests: Enter any special requests or notes here
selectBothStartAndEndDates: Please select both start and end dates for your booking.
pageNotFoundMessage: Sorry, the page you are looking for does not exist or has been moved.
enterCredentialsToAccessAccount: Enter your credentials to access your account.
invalidCredentials: Invalid email or password. Please try again.
selectDateRangePrompt: Select a date range to check dormitory availability and book your stay.
dormitoryNotAvailableAdminOverride: Room {roomNumber} is currently disabled by admin and cannot be booked.
errorFetchingDormitoryDetails: Could not fetch details for the selected dormitory. Please try again.
noDormitoryIdProvided: No dormitory ID was provided for booking.
itemNotAvailableError: {itemName} is currently not available for booking.
errorFetchingItemDetails: Error fetching item details. Please try again.
noItemIdProvided: No item ID was provided for booking.
mustBeLoggedInAsCompany: You must be logged in as an approved company representative to book facilities.
mustBeLoggedInAsCompanyToBookFacility: You must be logged in as an approved company representative to book this facility.
accountPendingApprovalMultiBook: Your company account is pending approval. You can book facilities once your account is approved.
selectItemsToBookTogether: Select Halls and/or Sections to Book Together
selectMultipleDescription: Choose one or more facilities you'd like to include in a single booking request.
loginToBookMultipleDesc: Please log in as an approved company representative to select and book multiple facilities together.
noItemsCurrentlyAvailable: No halls or sections are currently available.
noItemsCurrentlyAvailableForSelection: No items are currently available for selection.
pleaseSelectItemsToBook: Please select at least one item to book.
errorFetchingHallsAndSections: Failed to fetch halls and sections. Please try refreshing the page.
checkingAvailabilityForRange: Checking availability for the selected range...
noFacilitiesAvailableInDateRange: No facilities are available for the selected date range and filter.
noItemsCurrentlyMatchFilters: No items match the current filters. Try adjusting your selection.
selectDateAndFilterFacility: Select your desired dates and filter by type to find the perfect venue.
manageKeyAssignmentsForGuests: Manage key assignments for guests with paid and approved dormitory bookings.
searchByNamePhoneId: Search by guest name, phone, or booking ID...
noPaidDormBookingsForKeyAssignment: There are currently no paid and approved dormitory bookings requiring key assignment.
noBookingsMatchKeyholderSearch: No bookings match your search criteria.
keyholderOnlyPage: This page is accessible only by authorized keyholders.
errorFetchingDormBookingsForKeyholder: Failed to fetch dormitory bookings for key assignment.
dailyReportPlaceholder: Daily key activity report will be shown here.
keyholderDashboardWelcome: Welcome, Keyholder! Manage dormitory key assignments and view reports.
noKeyholderActivity: No recent key activity to display.
bookingConfirmationMessageDorm: Your dormitory booking request for {itemName} has been received. It is currently pending payment verification. Please make a bank transfer for {amount} ETB to the account details provided and use your phone number ({phone}) to send proof via Telegram for confirmation.
bookingConfirmationMessageFacility: Your booking request for {itemName} has been successfully submitted and is pending approval. We will contact you shortly regarding the total cost of {amount} ETB and next steps.
incompleteBookingConfirmationDetails: Incomplete booking confirmation details. Please try booking again or contact support.
yourBookingRequestHasBeenProcessed: Your booking request has been processed. Further details are below.
contactUsSubtitle: We're here to help! Reach out to us through any of the channels below.
contactBuildingAdminsDesc: For specific inquiries related to dormitory rooms in these buildings, please contact the respective administrators.
generalInquiriesDesc: For all other questions, facility bookings, or support, please use the contact details below.
mapPlaceholder: Google Maps embed will appear here.
mustBeLoggedInAsCompanyDashboard: You need to be logged in as an approved company representative to view this dashboard.
registrationPendingMessage: Your company registration is currently under review. You will be notified once it's approved. You can access the dashboard after approval.
registrationRejectedMessage: We regret to inform you that your company registration could not be approved at this time.
contactSupportForAssistance: Please contact support if you believe this is an error or for further assistance.
statusUnknownMessage: Could not determine your account status. Please contact support.
yourActiveBookingsDescription: View and manage your ongoing and upcoming facility bookings.
noActiveBookingsFound: You have no active bookings at the moment.
agreementUploadedSuccessfully: Signed agreement uploaded successfully. Status updated.
errorUploadingAgreement: Error uploading agreement. Please try again.
failedToUploadToCloudinary: Failed to upload file to cloud storage.
errorFetchingYourBookings: Failed to fetch your bookings. Please try again.
loginAsCompanyToBook: Please log in as an approved company representative to book facilities.
accountPendingApprovalBookFacility: Your company account is pending approval. You cannot book facilities until your account is approved.
itemNotAvailableErrorMultiBook: Item '{itemName}' is currently not available and has been removed from your selection.
itemNotFoundDatabase: Item '{itemName}' was not found in our records. It may have been removed.
errorFetchingItemDetailsMulti: Could not fetch details for item '{itemName}'. It has been removed from selection.
noItemsSelectedForBooking: No items were selected for booking. Please select items from the halls page.
noValidItemsForBooking: No valid items could be prepared for booking. Please try selecting again.
paymentAwaitingTelegramVerificationDesc: Your booking request has been received. Please complete the bank transfer and send proof via Telegram for verification.
thankYouFacilityBookingWillBeReviewed: Thank you! Your booking request for the facility has been received and will be reviewed by our team shortly. We will contact you for confirmation and payment.
paymentReferenceNoteConfirmationPage: IMPORTANT: After payment, send proof via Telegram to @oroedubot including your phone number and this booking ID: {bookingId}.
myDormitoryDescription: Check the status of your active dormitory booking using your phone number.
errorSearchingBookings: An error occurred while searching for your bookings. Please try again.
noActiveBookingsFoundForPhone: No active and approved dormitory bookings found for this phone number.
selectDatesToSeeAvailableDorms: Please select a date range to view available dormitories.
noDormsAvailableInDateRange: Sorry, no dormitories are available for the selected date range.
noDormitoriesConfigured: No dormitories are currently configured in the system.
phoneForTelegramIdentification: This phone number will be used to identify your payment proof on Telegram.
phoneForTelegramIdentificationOptional: This phone number can be used for Telegram communication if needed.
invalidDateRange: End date cannot be before start date.
dormitoryCapacityNotConfigured: The selected dormitory does not have its capacity configured. Please contact administration.
dormitoryBedsUnavailable: Sorry, room {roomName} does not have enough available beds for the selected dates.
itemUnavailableConflict: Item '{itemName}' is already booked or pending for some part of the selected date range.
errorCalculatingTotalCostNaN: Could not calculate total cost. Please check inputs.
couldNotCalculatePrice: Could not calculate price. Dormitory data might be incomplete.
sorryYouCannotBookTwice: Sorry, you cannot book a dormitory more than once for the same start day with the same phone number. If you need to modify your booking, please contact administration.
firestoreIndexRequiredErrorDetailed: A database configuration (index) is required for this operation. Please contact the site administrator. The booking cannot be completed at this time.
duplicateCheckSkippedBookingProceeds: A required database index is missing. Duplicate booking check was skipped. Your booking is proceeding, but please be aware.
completeYourPaymentDescription: Please follow the instructions below to finalize your booking.
paymentReferenceNote: IMPORTANT: After making the transfer, please send your payment proof (e.g., screenshot) via Telegram to @oroedubot. Include your phone number and this Booking ID: {bookingId} in your message.
telegramProofSubmissionInstruction: After transferring the amount, send a screenshot of your payment proof to our Telegram bot: {botUsername}. Make sure to include your phone number ({phoneNumber}) and the Booking ID in your message.
afterSendingProofAdminWillVerify: After you send the proof, our admin will verify your payment and confirm your booking.
paymentNotExpectedOrAlreadyProcessed: Payment is not expected for this booking or has already been processed.
pageNoLongerInUseMessage: This page for submitting payment proof is no longer active. Please follow the payment instructions provided during your booking, which usually involve sending proof via Telegram.
agreementNotApplicable: Agreement is not applicable for this type of booking.
termsPlaceholder1: 1. Payment Terms: Full payment is due upon signing this agreement unless otherwise specified. Late payments may incur penalties.
termsPlaceholder2: 2. Cancellation Policy: Cancellations made X days prior to the event will receive a Y% refund. Cancellations made less than X days prior will forfeit the full amount. No-shows are non-refundable.
termsPlaceholder3: 3. Use of Facility: Client agrees to use the facility only for the purpose stated and in accordance with all applicable laws and regulations. Any damage to the facility or equipment will be the responsibility of the client.
termsPlaceholder4: 4. Liability: The Service Provider is not responsible for any loss or damage to personal property of the Client or guests. The Client assumes full responsibility for the conduct of their guests.
bankDetailsForPaymentVerification: Use these details for payment verification if needed.
adminPaymentReferenceNote: Note: This information is for admin reference for verifying payments made to the center's account.

registerAdminDescription: Create a new administrator account for the system.

weakPasswordError: Password is too weak. It should be at least 6 characters.
superAdminOnlyPage: This page is accessible only by Superadmins.

paymentStatusMarkedAsPaid: Booking payment status marked as paid successfully.
enterCustomTermsHere: Enter or paste custom agreement terms here. Each new line will be a new paragraph.
editTermsNote: Changes here will override the default terms for this specific agreement.
agreementNotAvailableForBooking: Agreement generation is not applicable or booking is not in correct state for this booking.
agreementNotReadyForViewing: This agreement is not yet ready for viewing by the client or has not been sent.
mustBeLoggedInAsCompanyToViewAgreement: You must be logged in as an approved company representative to view this agreement.
accessDeniedViewAgreement: You do not have permission to view this agreement.
updateYourProfileDetails: Update your profile name and password.
companyRegistrationDescription: Register your company to book our facilities.
registrationSubmittedMessage: Your registration has been submitted and is pending approval. You will be notified via email.
individualUserNote: Individual users (for dormitory bookings) do not need to register. Proceed to the dormitory page to book.
networkRequestFailedError: Network error. Please check your internet connection and try again.
userDataMissingError: User data could not be found. Please contact support if this issue persists.
selectDateRangeForReports: Select a date range to generate reports.
selectReportTypeAndDateRange: Select a report type and ensure a date range is chosen above.
viewOrPrintDormitoryBookingData: View or print specific dormitory booking data for operational purposes.
selectDateRangeFirst: Please select a date range first.
noDataForReport: No data available for this report and selected range.
noDormitoryBookingsMatchFilters: No dormitory bookings match the current filters.
noDormitoryBookingsFoundAdminCta: No dormitory bookings found. Users can book via the public 'Dormitories' page.
viewAndManageDormitoryBookings: View and manage all dormitory bookings.
noFacilityBookingsMatchFilters: No facility bookings match the current filters.

discoverMoreSubtitle: Scan the QR code below with your smartphone to view our digital brochure and learn more about our services and facilities.
scanForBrochureDesc: Access our full brochure on your mobile device.
brochureDormitoriesDesc: Clean, secure, and affordable dormitory rooms perfect for students and individual stays.
brochureHallsDesc: Multi-purpose halls and sections suitable for meetings, conferences, workshops, and events of all sizes.
brochureCateringDesc: Delicious and customizable catering options for your events, from coffee breaks to full meals.
brochureAboutUsContent: {siteName} is a premier center dedicated to providing top-notch educational resources, training programs, and versatile rental facilities. We aim to support learning, research, and community engagement by offering high-quality accommodation and event spaces. Our commitment is to excellence, customer satisfaction, and fostering a conducive environment for growth and collaboration.
brochureKeyFeaturesMore: And many more tailored to your needs...
brochureWhyChooseExcellentService: Dedicated staff and excellent customer service.
brochureWhyChooseCommitmentToQuality: Commitment to quality and a positive experience.
brochureCallToActionTitle: Get in Touch or Visit Us!
brochureCallToActionDesc: We are excited to host you or your event. Contact us today for inquiries, bookings, or to schedule a visit.
brochureSubtitle: Your premier destination for accommodation and event facilities in Oromia. Explore our offerings and book your space today.
